body: I would take care of him to make him die slowly so each day he would curse the moment when he lay finger on my beloved Myoukou-class girls. One day if I will come back to Kantai Collection I'm going to give all of them rings cause I will never forget how they helped me in most iconic event in this game Summer 2015. But if he would lay his filthy hands on my Myoukou I don't even want to write what I would do to him.
So...why did he chose to sunk those ship instead of just go all out threesome?
Fuck guys like that. He deserves that death more than anything.m
It looks like Haguro few part story come to an end finally.
